DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effectiveness of RXI-109 in reducing the recurrence of hypertrophic scar formation following elective revision of a pre-existing hypertrophic abdominal scar.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Effectiveness and Safety of RXI 109 on the Outcome of Scar Revision Surgery in Healthy Adults
